<h3> Recent work from Melbourne </h3>

Meetup participants have recent or upcoming presentations at meetings involving the [Australasian Brain and Psychological Sciences Meeting](https://www.acns.org.au/conferences/abps-2022/), the [Meeting of the Society for Mathematical Psychology]( 
https://mathpsych.org/conference/10/ ), the [Monash Addiction Research Centre Symposium](https://www.monash.edu/medicine/ehcs/marc/marc-symposium), the  [Mathematical Cognition & Learning Society Conference](https://mcls2022.com/), the [Annual Computational Neuroscience Meeting](https://www.cnsorg.org/cns-2022), and the [Annual Meeting of the Cognitive Science Society](https://cognitivesciencesociety.org/program/).

Below are links to some online presentations describing recent work.
